Text:
Hey Holy,

Did those iTunes info files help at all?  I've since been using Handbrake and selecting the total bitrate at 4500 kbps.  Been noticing a better quality in picture ever since, even when the source file is lower.

thanks for the upload holyroses...Big fan of your uploads! If you take requests do you mind uploading the Godfather Trilogy?

Thanks a bunch
Tried that setting with a TV episode, and all good there. Just trying it now with a movie. I'm going by what the iTunes store downloads seem to be averaged at, so I'll let you know how that goes.

The size of the file should depend, in part, on the length of the movie.  I'm going to experiment with different length movies, and see what happens.

I never used to use Handbrake, as it only worked part of the time, but so far the newest version (released a couple of months ago) has worked with 100% of the source files.
